name: Odesi
description: Odesi is a web-based data exploration, extraction, and analysis tool. It lets you search for survey questions (variables) across thousands of datasets. The service contains over 5,700 datasets curated by university libraries, including Statistics Canada datasets, datafiles from Gallup Canada and other polling companies, public-domain files such as the Canadian National Election Surveys and selected files from the Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research (ICPSR).
owner_name: Scholars Portal, Ontario Council of University Libraries (OCUL), OntarioBuys
